sentences.en: All departments will be able to recover reusable stationery reuse.
sentences.cn: 各部门将可重复使用的文具回收再利用.

sentences.en: All these codes are hardly reusable and prone to errors.
sentences.cn: 这些代码几乎不可重用,也很容易发生错误.

sentences.en: At present, the market of reusable shopping bags were mostly non - woven fabrics.
sentences.cn: 目前, 市场上销售的环保购物袋大部分是无纺布制作的.

sentences.en: Data structures are reusable because they tend to be modular and context - free.
sentences.cn: 因为数据结构趋向于模块化并和环境无关,所以数据结构是可以复用的.

sentences.en: Embedded GIS platform should be highly reusable through component based development.
sentences.cn: 在基于组件的开发模式下,嵌入式GIS平台将具有更高的重用性.

sentences.en: Environmental issues will also be addressed by using biodegradable or reusable packaging.
sentences.cn: 此外,食物会以可分解或可循环再用的物料包装,以达到环保的目的.

sentences.en: In our paper , we consider reusable non - malleable mercurial commitment schemes.
sentences.cn: 讨论了多重 非 延展水银承诺方案.

sentences.en: Liang mind the overall situation, not care, they are still reusable.
sentences.cn: 诸葛亮胸怀全局, 毫不介意, 仍重用他们.

sentences.en: Merge Module projects allow you to create reusable setup components.
sentences.cn: 使用“合并模块”项目可以创建可重用的安装组件.

sentences.en: Software reengineering is also a main route to construct reusable resource.
sentences.cn: 软件再工程技术也是产生可复用资源的一条主要途径.

sentences.en: Store refrigerated food in reusable containers rather than in plastic wrap or aluminium foil.
sentences.cn: 用可再用容器而不是保鲜膜或铝箔纸来储存冷冻食品。

sentences.en: Take the time to explain why you shop with reusable bags.
sentences.cn: 耐心解释为什么要用这种袋子购物.

sentences.en: The ability to separate out reusable elements from other waste is crucial.
sentences.cn: 能从其他废料中分离出可重复利用成分是很关键的。

sentences.en: The predictor - corrector reentry guidance algorithm for reusable launch vehicles was studied.
sentences.cn: 摘要研究了可重复使用运载器的预测 - 校正再入制导方案.

sentences.en: The reusable components include object class, framework and architecture etc.
sentences.cn: 这些可重用构件包括对象类 、 框架或者软件体系结构等.

sentences.en: Two reusable tapes at and bottom a comfortable fit.
sentences.cn: 上下两排加强胶带,合身舒适,并可重覆黏贴.

trans.tran_cn: 可再用的，可重复使用的，可重用的
trans.tran_en: Things that are reusable can be used more than once
